mapper.sql: id, user_account_id, title, content, preview_content, preview_img, state, comment_count, reply_count, browse_count, like_count, publish_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into feed_info (id, user_account_id, title, content, preview_content, preview_img, state, comment_count, reply_count, browse_count, like_count, publish_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previewContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previewImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
user_account_id,
title,
content,
preview_content,
preview_img,
state,
comment_count,

browse_count,

mapper.update:
update feed_info
user_account_id = #{userAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
preview_content = #{previewContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
preview_img = #{previewImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reply_count = #{replyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
browse_count = #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update feed_info set user_account_id = #{userAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, preview_content = #{previewContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, preview_img = #{previewImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reply_count = #{replyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, browse_count = #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select f.id, f.user_account_id, f.title, f.content, f.preview_img, f.preview_content, f.browse_count, f.comment_count, f.reply_count, f.like_count, f.publish_time, u.nickname, u.email from feed_info f left join user_account u on f.user_account_id = u.id where f.id = #{feedId}

select f.id, f.user_account_id, f.title, f.content, f.preview_img, f.preview_content, f.browse_count, f.comment_count, f.reply_count, f.like_count, f.publish_time, u.nickname, u.email from feed_info f left join user_account u on f.user_account_id = u.id order by f.publish_time desc limit #{start}, #{offset}
